data.name: Ruinlander
data.detailed_description:
Ruinlander is an open-world role-playing game with turn-based combat where you must survive in the post-apocalyptic wasteland as long as you can.

Features:




  • Survival - Hardcore survival mechanics with hunger, thirst, fatigue, hypothermia, poisoning, radiation, injuries and more.
  • Scavenging Runs - Exploring abandoned and ruined settlements for food and supplies.
  • Encounters and Events - Random encounters and events create dangers situations in which you must make choices that affect the your own survival story.
  • Quests - Nonlinear gameplay. Many quests, some of which with alternative solutions and outcomes.
  • Karma and faction reputation - Some choices will affect karma and faction relations. Good relations unlock trade and new quest branches.
  • Crafting - Craft and upgrade weapons, equipment, tools. Lots of cooking recipes.
  • Levelling-up stats and skills - Improve your skills and attributes - increase your chance of survival.
  • Making decisions - Influence the plot with your choices, that affect the story.
  • Weather and Temperature System - Temperature, rain, and day/night time may affects movement and some actions.
  • Exploration - Large wandering map with many hidden locations.
  • Hunting and Fishing - Use your skills to find a suitable place for fishing or head out into the wilderness and hunt wild animals.
  • Gathering - Search for plants, berries and mushrooms, and use special skills to identify what's safe to eat.
  • Building - Build from the bonfire to the improved workbench and shelter.
...And much more!

data.short_description: Ruinlander is an open-world role-playing game with turn-based combat where you must survive in the post-apocalyptic wasteland as long as you can.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista, 7, 10 64bit OS required
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Dual Core; Quad-core recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1 GB of RAM minimum
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64bit
  • Processor: Intel 2.77GHz Dual Core; Quad-core recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1 GB of RAM minimum
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
